IncrementalenrichmentAIenrichment(skills)Adds caching to anenrichment pipeline,allowing you to reuseexisting output if a targetedmodification, such as anupdate to a skillset oranother object, doesn'tchange the content.Caching applies only toenriched documentsproduced by a skillset.Create or Update Indexer(preview), API versions2021-04-30-Preview,2020-06-30-Preview, or2019-05-06-Preview.
moreLikeThisQueryFinds documents that arerelevant to a specificdocument. This feature hasbeen in earlier previews.Search Documents(preview) calls, in allsupported API versions:2023-10-10-Preview,2023-07-01-Preview,2021-04-30-Preview,2020-06-30-Preview,2019-05-06-Preview,2016-09-01-Preview,2017-11-11-Preview. Experimental features are available through the preview REST API first, followed byAzure portal, and then the Azure SDKs.The following statements apply to preview features:Preview features are available under Supplemental Terms of Use, without aservice level agreement.Preview features might undergo breaking changes if a redesign is required.
Sometimes preview features don't make it into a GA release.Each Azure SDK team releases beta packages on their own timeline. Check the changelog for mentions of new features in beta packages:Using preview featuresPreview feature support in Azure SDKsChange log for Azure SDK for .
